data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Dolnośląskie to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Dolnośląskie, Poland
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, help 575 new simple churches start among the 2,876,600 people in the state of Dolnośląskie, Poland. One within reach of everyone living here.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Dolnośląskie, Poland to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Dolnośląskie, Poland.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Jew, Karaite people might believe through him.
Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Dolnośląskie.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Dolnośląskie, Poland.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 322 neighbors who are far from you in Dolnośląskie. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.
